body_html:
I'm not sure that I can reproduce this. When I write tensorboard --logdir x:/tmp/data,y:/tmp/moredata, I can view data from both logdirs, and this still holds on refresh.

If you can provide a consistent repro case, please feel free to reopen this issue in our new repository at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorboard/issues. Thanks!
body_text:
I'm not sure that I can reproduce this. When I write tensorboard --logdir x:/tmp/data,y:/tmp/moredata, I can view data from both logdirs, and this still holds on refresh.
If you can provide a consistent repro case, please feel free to reopen this issue in our new repository at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorboard/issues. Thanks!
body:
I'm not sure that I can reproduce this. When I write `tensorboard --logdir x:/tmp/data,y:/tmp/moredata`, I can view data from both logdirs, and this still holds on refresh.

If you can provide a consistent repro case, please feel free to reopen this issue in our new repository at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorboard/issues. Thanks!
